Sorry
Sorry
Sorry
Sorry
Sorry

Please don't say you're sorry

I've heard it all before
I've heard it all before
I've heard it all before
I've heard it all before
I've heard it all before
I've heard it all before
I've heard it all before

I'm sorry

Please forgive me
I'm sorry
